snippet: Alex MacLean has been taking pictures of New York rooftops for a new book, "Up on the Roof," which shows that there are more private sanctuaries, public gathering places and verdant expanses up there than most of us would expect.
abstract: Alex MacLean has been taking pictures of New York rooftops for a new book, "Up on the Roof," which shows that there are more private sanctuaries, public gathering places and verdant expanses up there than most of us would expect.

headline.main: Hovering Above the Skyline, Armed With a Camera
